meanings.definition: The cup-shaped skeletal deposits formed by individual polyps in a coral colony.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the tiny corallites under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: The diver marveled at the intricate corallites in the coral reef.
meanings.sent3: The playful fish swam around the corallites, pretending they were tiny cups.
meanings.sent4: The corallites stood like miniature skyscrapers in the underwater city of coral.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight filtering through the corallites created a mesmerizing pattern on the ocean floor.

meanings.definition: The individual skeletal structures that make up a coral reef.
meanings.sent1: The coral reef was made of countless corallites, each contributing to its beauty.
meanings.sent2: The marine biologist explained how the corallites support the entire coral reef ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The tourists were amazed by the corallites, thinking they looked like tiny building blocks.
meanings.sent4: The corallites intertwined like a complex puzzle forming the foundation of the reef.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the corallites painted a breathtaking picture of life under the sea.
